page.title: 14 A mothers day.
page.content: My mum gets up about 8.00 a.m and when she is dressed she comes downstairs to put the kettle on to make a cup of tea. When I have left for school she does some washing or hoovering and looks after my three year old brother.She stop for a cup of coffee and a biscuit at about 10.00 a.m.I come home from school at 12.00 and we have a snack lunch together. She drives my brother and his friends to playgroup in a nearby village and then serves in the village shop all afternoon.She cooks our tea after school and then has a rest watching Â£Cross Roads' on television.At 7.00 she gets ready to go to another part time job at the pub called Â£The Crown' at Weson.She comes home between 11.00 p.m and midnight.
